These are the docs for `fasttrackpy`

## Installation

You can install `fasttrackpy` with pip.

```bash
pip install fasttrackpy
```

In addition to making the python modules available, this will also make the `fasttrack` command line executable available.

## Usage
The `fasttrack` executable has two commands

```bash
fasttrack audio ...
```

and 

```bash
fasttrack audio-textgrid ...
```

Fore more info, see [the quickstart](usage/getting_started.qmd).
